pull.title: Add a new checkpoint at block 279,000
pull.body: Perhaps we want to wait another 37 blocks or so before merging this, but I figured, may as well get the change ready in advance...

events.body: We can merge anytime.  It will only impact a few, until release.
Did you check to make sure there are no blocks before block 279,000 with a timestamp after the timestamp of the checkpoint, and there is no block after with a timestamp before?
@Michagogo, @gavinandresen, just recently I was thinking about this but the timestamp requirements scared me off. Why don't we make a program that automatically checks the timestamp requirements?
@bardiharborow Yes such as script would be useful, please do
ACK. Numbers are correct, and timestamps around block 279000 are strictly increasing.
@gavinandresen I see that @sipa already mentioned it, but yes, I did check that before putting this block in the PR. (that's what I was referring to in the commit message for ~~ffb5e48~~ e7906d1)

verification.payload:
tree 83b324654fdf6fbd1096b7230ee7204919f7365c
parent 490d6a30461d11aa112efe9fb3006797651ba4d5
author Micha <michagogo@server.fake> 1389961243 +0200
committer Micha <michagogo@server.fake> 1390074766 +0200

Add a new checkpoint at block 279,000

From a cursory glance, it looks like block 279,000 meets the criteria for
a checkpoint block, and it's also what the bootstrap.dat torrent is at. This closes #3530.

a checkpoint block, and it's also what the bootstrap.dat torrent is at. This closes #3530.

events.body:
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/6873cfb6c0efaeb645ef0a7074651623bb4bec82 for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.
Ok, block 279,000 is confirmed by 2206 blocks as of the time of writing. Are we ready to merge?
